channel.title: New music and MIDI
channel.description:
since the new music doesn't doesn't base on our hardware anymore, does that mean that we cant extract them as midi anymore?
thanks in advance

item.title: New music and MIDI
item.dc:creator: @doctorwho278 doctorwho278
item.description:
@doctorwho278 wrote:

music can get a bit boring at times but it helps me concentrte

Read full topic

item.title: New music and MIDI
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“gsp, post:10, topic:65482”][quote author=io9 link=topic=95192.msg993282#msg993282 date=1173551477]

The MIDI format has not changed, so I am not sure what you are asking.

but it dont play with our synthesizer… how can we get them out?

Use pplsuqbawlz’s extractor. If you’re too dumb to use that, forget about it and go back to moparisthebest.com.

Of course your synthesizer can’t play it, think of the files as “encrypted”, and pplsuqbawlz’s program is the “decrypter”.
[/quote]

i had, can you?

before those sound fx must past through the synthesizer, so make it possible to dump it song by song
pplsuqbawlz is not really a decrypter…it is a merely a dumper…
i have to find a song from like 700 files… thats like like searching something from a land fill…

meh, i guess i need to find my own way through the deobs…[/quote]
It’s an analogy.

Read full topic

item.title: New music and MIDI
item.dc:creator: @gsp gsp
item.description:
@gsp wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:9, topic:65482”][quote author=gsp link=topic=95192.msg993247#msg993247 date=1173550734]

The MIDI format has not changed, so I am not sure what you are asking.

but it dont play with our synthesizer… how can we get them out?
[/quote]
Use pplsuqbawlz’s extractor. If you’re too dumb to use that, forget about it and go back to moparisthebest.com.

Of course your synthesizer can’t play it, think of the files as “encrypted”, and pplsuqbawlz’s program is the “decrypter”.[/quote]

i had, can you?

before those sound fx must past through the synthesizer, so make it possible to dump it song by song
pplsuqbawlz is not really a decrypter…it is a merely a dumper…
i have to find a song from like 700 files… thats like like searching something from a land fill…

meh, i guess i need to find my own way through the deobs…

Read full topic

item.title: New music and MIDI
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“gsp, post:8, topic:65482”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=95192.msg986270#msg986270 date=1173407090]
The MIDI format has not changed, so I am not sure what you are asking.
[/quote]

but it dont play with our synthesizer… how can we get them out?[/quote]
Use pplsuqbawlz’s extractor. If you’re too dumb to use that, forget about it and go back to moparisthebest.com.

Of course your synthesizer can’t play it, think of the files as “encrypted”, and pplsuqbawlz’s program is the “decrypter”.

Read full topic

item.title: New music and MIDI
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

What are you on about there youngin’?

If the client can extract the MIDIs, so can you.
It wont work if they changed the cache format at all (which I don’t think they did), but try looking for psb’s MIDI extractor.

Read full topic

item.title: New music and MIDI
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

Of course theres a way. Think about it, if it’s coming from an external source and you can hear it through your speakers, then it’s being downloaded to your computer. Simple logic. Obviously how, is another thing.

Read full topic
